attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that living in uk is very hard at the moment ,i dont agree that banks ect can get away with these charges anymore ,some people are forced to go overdrawn because of the price of living keeps going up and up ,my gas/electricity charges are £100 per month why ? nothing ever gets done about these stupid price rises anyway to whom ever reads this letter sit back and take note to what the people of GREAT UK ?are saying because if you dont the countrys morals will hit rock bottom and what a shame that would be so please listen to us .cheers joe bratt

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
